channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.description:
Near to a zebra crossing, so it's quite important to have a working light there

item.title: Rain gardens ruined, 10th February
item.description:
On Hertford Road by Grosvenor Road N9 the rain gardens either side of Grosvenor Road have been ruined by cars that constantly park on here when they go to Kervan Restaurant across the road, it is not a parking bay it is a rain garden that was installed as part of the Cycle Lane, it looks awful and even worse when it has rained.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 264, Hertford Road, Ponders End, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lights out both sides school crossing, 10th February
item.description:
Junction Sherwood road and Welling way. Reported 6 weeks ago. Still not fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 82, Welling Way, Falconwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned car - not moved for over 8 weeks, 10th February
item.description:
This car is the property of 114 sandy hill. They are a Romainian family who have moved out. The car is attracting people as the boot is open....I have to keep closing it! It has a few flat tyres and had lots of unpaid parking tickets. I have asked the parking attendant if he can help and he said no. Can it be moved please.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Sandy Hill Road, Woolwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bollards and road signs knocked over, 10th February
item.description:
By a car that crashed into them was reported 2 weeks ago on fix my street with little progress since, makes the houses there vulnerable should another vehicle lose control on the corner proper crash barriers should be installed here rather than old concrete bollards.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Monmouth Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 10th February
item.description:
Elmfield Wood entrance to the park has been used for flytipping for almost 6 months. Items include an old online ordered hoover, bags of empty beer and fanta cans and so on.There is also lots of boxes used for industrial style wrapping.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Victoria Road, Southborough, Greater London
